TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObservableCollection`1<T> extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<!T> implements class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class ObservableCollection(Of T) Inherits Collection(Of T) Implements INotifyCollectionChanged, INotifyPropertyChanged

generic <typename T> public ref class ObservableCollection : System::Collections::ObjectModel::Collection<T>, System::Collections::Specialized::INotifyCollectionChanged, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged

span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

span.span: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，你使用的数据是对象的集合。In many cases the data that you work with is a collection of objects. 例如，数据绑定中的一个常见方案是使用如， ，或以显示记录的集合。For example, a common scenario in data binding is to use an such as a , , or to display a collection of records. 你可以枚举任何集合可实现接口。You can enumerate over any collection that implements the interface. 但是，若要设置动态绑定，使插入或删除集合中的更新[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]集合必须实现自动接口。However, to set up dynamic bindings so that insertions or deletions in the collection update the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automatically, the collection must implement the interface. 此接口公开事件，每当基础集合更改时将引发的事件。This interface exposes the event, an event that should be raised whenever the underlying collection changes. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供类，该类是数据集合可实现的内置实现接口。 provides the class, which is a built-in implementation of a data collection that implements the interface. 在实施之前你自己的集合，请考虑使用或一个现有集合类，如， ，和，此外还有许多其他。Before implementing your own collection, consider using or one of the existing collection classes, such as , , and , among many others. 如果你有高级的方案，并想要实现您自己的集合，请考虑使用，它提供可按照索引单独访问的对象的非泛型集合。If you have an advanced scenario and want to implement your own collection, consider using , which provides a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index. 实现与数据绑定引擎提供最佳性能。Implementing provides the best performance with the data binding engine. > [!NOTE] > 若要完全支持从绑定源对象到绑定目标传输的数据值，您支持可绑定属性的集合中每个对象必须实现适当的属性更改通知机制如接口。To fully support transferring data values from binding source objects to binding targets, each object in your collection that supports bindable properties must implement an appropriate property changed notification mechanism such as the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅"绑定到集合"[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## 有关 XAML 用法说明Notes on XAML Usage 可以用作中的 XAML 对象元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，在版本 3.0 和 3.5。 can be used as a XAML object element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], in versions 3.0 and 3.5. 但是，使用情况有很大的局限性。However, the usage has substantial limitations. - 因为，必须用于指定约束的泛型类型必须是根元素，仅支持对象元素的根元素上。 must be the root element, because the that must be used to specify the constrained type of the generic is only supported on the object element for the root element. - 必须声明 (必须是此 XAML 文件的生成操作的需要`Page`或某些其他生成编译 XAML 的操作)。You must declare an (which entails that the build action for this XAML file must be `Page` or some other build action that compiles the XAML). - 命名空间和程序集，最初未映射到默认 XML 命名空间中。 is in a namespace and assembly that are not initially mapped to the default XML namespace. 你必须映射的前缀的命名空间和程序集，，然后在对象元素标记上使用该前缀。You must map a prefix for the namespace and assembly, and then use that prefix on the object element tag for . 更直接的方法，以使用从 XAML 应用程序中的功能是声明您自己的自定义非泛型集合类派生自，和约束到特定的类型。A more straightforward way to use capabilities from XAML in an application is to declare your own non-generic custom collection class that derives from , and constrains it to a specific type. 然后映射包含此类的程序集并作为对象元素在 XAML 中引用它。Then map the assembly that contains this class, and reference it as an object element in your XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素复制到与它们的集合的枚举器会读取相同的顺序。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在清除列表时，基的类将调用此方法。The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared. 此实现将引发事件。This implementation raises the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法基类。For more information, see the method of the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和方法以修改此集合引发通过此事件`virtual`方法。Properties and methods that modify this collection raise the event through this `virtual` method. ## Examples 在重写此方法，请调用基实现，或使用更改方法以处理可重入的集合，如以下示例所示：When overriding this method, either call the base implementation or use the method to handle reentrant collection changes, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/CSharp/DataSource.cs#blockreentrancy)] [!code-vb[ObservableCollection_snip#BlockReentrancy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ObservableCollection_snip/visualbasic/datasource.vb#blockreentrancy)]
